name: JUST DASH
description: Can you pass all the chapters? JUST DASH!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit | Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.4 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX / AMD Radeon 6870 HD or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: Windows compatible
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
